**Example 1: 新增微服务返回id**



Input: 

```
tccli tsf CreateMicroserviceWithDetailResp --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --NamespaceId namespace-xxxxxxx \
    --MicroserviceName consumer-demo1
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "2bb5b35d-cdad-45a0-96ce-bc48abe98cc7",
        "Result": "xxx"
    }
}
```
